bio: Born amidst the jagged peaks of The Reach, the winds whisper my name – I am Harrok Oxfell, a Tengu barbarian. My fervent desire propels me to claim the title of Skyrim's mightiest warrior. Proficient in two-handed weapons and heavy armor, my journey into the vast unknown demanded I confront my deepest fear – heights. With resolute courage, I leapt from the towering cliffs of Druadach Mountains, transcending the very fear that sought to bind me.
name: Harrok Oxfell
